CustomField.formula: IF(NOT( ISBLANK ( Contact__r.Father__c ) ), Contact__r.Father__r.FirstName&' '&Contact__r.Father__r.LastName&', '&Contact__r.RH_Parent_Phone_Number__c , IF(NOT( ISBLANK (Contact__r.Mother__c) ), Contact__r.Mother__r.FirstName&' '&Contact__r.Mother__r.LastName&', '&Contact__r.RH_Parent_Phone_Number__c, IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Contact__r.Guardian__c) ) , Contact__r.Guardian__r.FirstName&' '&Contact__r.Guardian__r.LastName&', '&Contact__r.RH_Parent_Phone_Number__c, '') ) )
CustomField.label: Contact details
